name: Arisk The Game
description:
This classic platformer-style game features vintage graphics and tunes that grab you by the nostalgia while you run, jump, and fail your way through three landscapes.
Complete the journey to find 'your happiness' while dodging strong painkillers, tranquilizers, and booze that fall from the sky.

Manage your pain and keep your anxiety bar low. Use the healthy choices to do this or you freak out and die. Don't have too many pills or you die. Don't mix too many medications and alcohol or you die. Don't fall too far or – just kidding, falling is fine. Have fun!

The controls are basic, the style is old-school, and we bet you can't play just once. This thrilling game of spacebar skills is also a journey of learning!

Check out:

  • What happens when you misuse addictive medications in a risk-free* online environment. The consequences are less tragic! *Game still contains risk of possible frustration (skill dependent)
  • Alternatives to addictive medications in a way that requires absolutely no effort from you (unlike real life).
  • What 'your happiness' looks like. Not really, guys – it's only a game.

If simple video games really are addictive.
